content.question: In Book 8 of the Aeneid, Aeneas is taken on a tour of Pallanteum. Describe specifically the significance of Pallanteum in the Aeneid.

frqParts.text: In Book 8 of the Aeneid, Aeneas is taken on a tour of Pallanteum. Describe specifically the significance of Pallanteum in the Aeneid.

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
